M

MineSweeper - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a class that simulates a game of MineSweeper according to the specifics in the online version, with additional features such as the ability to change the color, win/loss count, and winning/losing messages.
MineSweeper(String, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class MineSweeper
Constructor to intialize all the images, the size of the board, the name, the buttons matrix, and the frame.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class MineSweeper
Extra methods that need not be implemented but required for the implementation of the MouseListener interface.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class MineSweeper
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class MineSweeper
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class MineSweeper
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class MineSweeper
Method that branches into two paths.
